title: How to remove line? [Help with CTF]
content:
Hi! So, the program print me a 
Flag length is 32
. As I understand 
call strlen
convert my flag to string of length. So, I want to remove that part 
call strlen
or somehow avoid it (maybe I'm not right at all, because I really bad in assembly and RE, it's my first CTF and what are your options)

comments.text: Hi and welcome to RE.SE. So you want to patch the binary? In IDA you first need to enable the respective menu item. Alternatively you can use other tools to achieve the same.

answers_data.content:
I changed 
call strlen
to 
call printf
and got my flag. I am so happy and proud of myself.
